description:
In MisterMind, your goal is to find out the secret combination imagined by your evil opponent in order to save the world/princess you care so much about.
The code is composed of four colored items placed in a certain order. The same item can be used several times in the code.
After each attempt, your nemesis will let you know how close you were to finding out his secret combination when you miserably failed.
Now it's up to you to prove he's not that smart and save the day !
This game lets you define preferences such as time limit, custom number of items in play or number of attempts. High scores are saved on the device. Three different nice looking graphic themes are available.
